nodes.text: The Brekken Gang was a criminal gang of Nikto led by Captain Kenrik Fost. In 3630 BBY they received an order from Gault Rennow for obtaining a functional missile, with the trade-off scheduled at Vandin. However, Rennow's partner Vette managed to sneak inside the missile and sabotage it. When Rennow arrived, he refused to pay for the whole missile and activated its warhead, prompting Kenrik Fost and his men to run.
The Brekken Gang appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 13: Profit and Plunder.
